stripped_doc: Gap size in pixels for grid margins. Default is 0. Only useful if you use hs.grid.
Variable.doc: Gap size in pixels for grid margins. Default is 0. Only useful if you use hs.grid.
Variable.name: gap
Variable.desc: Gap size in pixels for grid margins. Default is 0. Only useful if you use hs.grid.

stripped_doc: Enable hs.grid integration. When true, reapplies grid configuration after toggling menubar. Default is false. Automatically set to true when gap is configured.
Variable.doc: Enable hs.grid integration. When true, reapplies grid configuration after toggling menubar. Default is false. Automatically set to true when gap is configured.
Variable.name: hsGridIntegration
Variable.desc: Enable hs.grid integration. When true, reapplies grid configuration after toggling menubar. Default is false. Automatically set to true when gap is configured.

desc: Toggle macOS menubar autohide setting. It's always annoying to change the autohide of the menubar, sometimes I just want to control it as easy as it is to do with the Dock (e.g. cmd+opt+D). So I created a spoon that will toggle the autohide setting of the menubar.

Method.doc:
Initializes the spoon

Parameters:
* None

Returns:
* The ToggleMenubar object
Method.name: init

stripped_doc: Toggles the macOS menubar autohide setting and reapplies grid configuration if hsGridIntegration is enabled.
parameters: * deps - Optional table with dependencies. Keys: execute, osascript, timer, grid
Method.doc:
Toggles the macOS menubar autohide setting and reapplies grid configuration if hsGridIntegration is enabled.

Parameters:
* deps - Optional table with dependencies. Keys: execute, osascript, timer, grid

Returns:
* None

Notes:
* Reads current menubar state from NSGlobalDomain _HIHideMenuBar preference
* Uses AppleScript to toggle the autohide preference
* Waits 0.5 seconds for system animation before reapplying grid margins if hsGridIntegration is true
* This ensures window positioning remains consistent whether menubar is visible or hidden
notes: * Reads current menubar state from NSGlobalDomain _HIHideMenuBar preference
* Uses AppleScript to toggle the autohide preference
* Waits 0.5 seconds for system animation before reapplying grid margins if hsGridIntegration is true
* This ensures window positioning remains consistent whether menubar is visible or hidden
Method.name: toggle
Method.desc: Toggles the macOS menubar autohide setting and reapplies grid configuration if hsGridIntegration is enabled.

doc:
Toggle macOS menubar autohide setting. It's always annoying to change the autohide of the menubar, sometimes I just want to control it as easy as it is to do with the Dock (e.g. cmd+opt+D). So I created a spoon that will toggle the autohide setting of the menubar.

Download: [https://github.com/brennovich/ToggleMenubar.spoon](https://github.com/brennovich/ToggleMenubar.spoon)
name: ToggleMenubar
